sections.description:
A Wordpress plugin that connects to OpenAI to generate a meta description for your page.

Installation

  1. Download the plugin from the GitHub repository.
  2. Log in to your WordPress dashboard.
  3. Go to Plugins > Add New.
  4. Click on the Upload Plugin button, and choose the downloaded zip file.
  5. Click on Install Now and then Activate.

Updating Settings

  1. Go to Settings > Meta Description Boy.
  2. Enter your OpenAI API Key.
  3. Select the post types you want to generate meta descriptions for.
  4. Choose your OpenAI model.
  5. Click on Save Changes.

Generating Meta Description

  1. Edit a post or page.
  2. If content is present, click on the Generate Meta Description button in the Meta Description Boy box on the right hand side.
  3. Once generated, a message will appear below the button along with a Copy to Clipboard button.
  4. Click on Copy to Clipboard to copy the generated meta description.
